data.name: Adventure Field™ 3 100,000 Golds
data.detailed_description:
This DLC give the player :


  • 100,000 Golds in-game one time on every save file and new game...
  • It should unlock it self just after the menu and items tutorial...

Golds are the currency used in the game...

The DLC content don't need any special configuration...
